snippet: Juan Martin del Potro's magical month ended as it began — with the big Argentine crying on the court....
lead_paragraph: Juan Martin del Potro's magical month ended as it began — with the big Argentine crying on the court.

headline.print_headline: No More Tears: Stan Wawrinka Ends Del Potro's US Open Run
